video.title: Prison Break
video.synopsis: When his brother is wrongly convicted of murder, a structural engineer resolves to bust his sibling out of the notorious Fox River State Penitentiary.

episodes.synopsis: Structural engineer Michael Scofield gets himself sent to jail so he can plan an escape for his brother, a death-row inmate who says he's been framed.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Michael tries to get his hands on two items: a drug that will help him test positive for diabetes and a large bolt that he can use in his escape plan.
episodes.title: Allen

episodes.synopsis: Michael encounters problems bringing Abruzzi and Sucre into his plan. Meanwhile, Lincoln considers having a family member attend his execution.
episodes.title: Cell Test

episodes.synopsis: Michael obtains some caustic chemicals to use in his escape plan. Later, his new cellmate, Haywire, develops a fascination with Michael's tattoo.
episodes.title: Cute Poison

episodes.synopsis: While Kellerman and Hale push Michael's transfer, he stalls it to test the first part of his escape plan.
episodes.title: English, Fitz or Percy

episodes.synopsis: Michael's ploy to buy work time by prompting a cellblock lockdown leads to a full-scale riot. Meanwhile, Kellerman hires an inmate to kill Lincoln.
episodes.title: Riots, Drills and the Devil: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: During the prison riot, Michael rescues Sara, the assassin tries to kill Lincoln, and Bellick defies Pope to talk to the governor.
episodes.title: Riots, Drills and the Devil: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As Michael tries to figure out how to tunnel into a building that houses a guards' break room, Kellerman and Hale attempt to kill Veronica and LJ.
episodes.title: The Old Head

episodes.synopsis: T-Bag loses one slave and targets another. Meanwhile, Abruzzi's demotion within the prison hierarchy jeopardizes the escape plan.
episodes.title: Tweener

episodes.synopsis: To regain control of the work team and restore their chances of escape, Abruzzi persuades Michael to tell Falzone where he can find Fibonacci.
episodes.title: Sleight of Hand

episodes.synopsis: Michael builds a device to help figure out how much time his group will have to escape, and Westmoreland joins the breakout team.
episodes.title: And Then There Were 7

episodes.synopsis: Lincoln warns Michael that someone in the group will have to stay behind. Later, Abruzzi threatens to kill T-Bag if he doesn't drop out of the group.
episodes.title: Odd Man Out

episodes.synopsis: As Lincoln's execution nears, Michael puts the plan in motion. Meanwhile, Kellerman confronts Hale, and Veronica makes an announcement to the media.
episodes.title: End of the Tunnel

episodes.synopsis: As Michael tries to delay Lincoln's execution by altering the electric chair's wiring, Veronica and Nick attempt to get Steadman's body exhumed.
episodes.title: The Rat

episodes.synopsis: Lincoln gets a stay when a judge orders Steadman's body to be exhumed, and Sucre calls in a favor to help Michael verify a new route to the infirmary.
episodes.title: By the Skin and the Teeth

episodes.synopsis: Flashbacks shed light on how inmates Michael, Lincoln, Sucre, C-Note and T-Bag came to reside in the prison and how Sara ended up working there.
episodes.title: Brother's Keeper

episodes.synopsis: Michael is thrown into solitary confinement. Meanwhile, Sucre is left to pave over the escape hole in the guards' break room.
episodes.title: J-Cat

episodes.synopsis: As Michael tries to get Haywire to recall the missing tattoo piece, other team members must keep Bellick from auctioning off Michael and Sucre's cell.
episodes.title: Bluff

episodes.synopsis: Michael tries to figure out how to get the infirmary key from Sara. Meanwhile, Lincoln learns about his dad's role in the events that ruined his life.
episodes.title: The Key

episodes.synopsis: With the escape hole discovered, the cons have to make their break. But with Lincoln under 24-hour watch, he may have to be left behind.
episodes.title: Tonight

episodes.synopsis: After Michael forces Pope to transfer Lincoln to the prison infirmary, the escapees manage to get safely to Sara's unlocked office.
episodes.title: Go

episodes.synopsis: With the escape discovered, Bellick heads a massive manhunt for the cons as the vice president makes a shocking power play.
episodes.title: Flight

episodes.synopsis: Michael and his group give Bellick the slip, forcing him to relinquish command to an FBI special agent, who cracks the code to Michael's escape plan.
episodes.title: Manhunt

episodes.synopsis: Mahone uses LJ as bait to trap Lincoln and Michael. Later, a desperate courthouse rescue brings the brothers face-to-face with their pursuer.
episodes.title: Otis

episodes.synopsis: Michael's most valuable asset falls into Mahone's hands. Meanwhile, the fired Bellick drafts a partner to help get the escapees back in prison.
episodes.title: Scan

episodes.synopsis: Bellick captures Michael and his team, but it's not the police reward he's after. Elsewhere, T-Bag has a close call with the cops in Nebraska.
episodes.title: First Down

episodes.synopsis: The brothers finally arrive in Utah, only to discover that they aren't alone. Meanwhile, an unsuspecting Sara invites Kellerman to her apartment.
episodes.title: Map 1213

episodes.synopsis: With the millions buried somewhere under a housing development, Michael must coax the map out of T-Bag's head as Mahone gets ever closer to his prey.
episodes.title: Subdivision

episodes.synopsis: The escapees find the treasure, but Sucre has other plans. Elsewhere, Lincoln risks everything to get to LJ, and Sara lands on The Company's hit list.
episodes.title: Buried

episodes.synopsis: With the money gone and the police closing in, Michael and Sucre's only chance of escape is across the river -- but the water conceals a deadly trap.
episodes.title: Dead Fall

episodes.synopsis: Michael pays a visit to Mahone's ex-wife and pieces together the agent's dark secret. Elsewhere, Kellerman is on Sara's trail.
episodes.title: Unearthed

episodes.synopsis: While Bellick is busy getting T-Bag to give up his secret -- the hard way -- Michael and Sara reunite. But their time together is cut short by Mahone.
episodes.title: Rendezvous

episodes.synopsis: To reunite with Michael, Lincoln must leave LJ behind. Elsewhere, T-Bag escapes the police but pays a devastating price, and Kellerman tortures Sara.
episodes.title: Bolshoi Booze

episodes.synopsis: Sara breaks free from her tormentor. Meanwhile, Aldo makes his peace with Michael but pays the ultimate price.
episodes.title: Disconnect

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Lincoln are en route to Fox River, but Mahone and Kellerman do everything in their power to make sure the brothers are dead on arrival.
episodes.title: The Killing Box

episodes.synopsis: Kellerman brings Michael and Lincoln face-to-face with Steadman, but their plans unravel. Meanwhile, Bellick crosses the wrong prisoner at Fox River.
episodes.title: John Doe

episodes.synopsis: While on the run with Kellerman, Michael and Lincoln reveal their story on national television, and Michael gets a coded message to Sara.
episodes.title: The Message

episodes.synopsis: During a diner robbery, C-Note must weigh his daughter's health against the life of a waitress. Elsewhere, Kellerman solves the riddle of Sara's key.
episodes.title: Chicago

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Sara turn to Pope to get the evidence that will topple The Company. Meanwhile, an escapee must choose between his daughter and his pals.
episodes.title: Bad Blood

episodes.synopsis: Michael, Lincoln and Sara finally hear the proof that can set Lincoln free, but they'll need another ally on the inside to get the truth out.
episodes.title: Wash

episodes.synopsis: Michael finally comes face-to-face with the president. Meanwhile, C-Note is offered an out if he'll double-cross Mahone.
episodes.title: Sweet Caroline

episodes.synopsis: With the brothers preparing to sail away to freedom, Sara is forced to sacrifice herself to ensure their safety.
episodes.title: Panama

episodes.synopsis: Michael is determined to get the $5 million and to put an end to T-Bag's reign of terror. Meanwhile, Sara goes on trial.
episodes.title: Fin del Camino

episodes.synopsis: Michael attempts to save himself and Lincoln from Mahone's double cross. Elsewhere, a surprise witness at Sara's trial changes everything.
episodes.title: Sona

episodes.synopsis: In Sona prison, Michael runs afoul of the penitentiary's criminal kingpin. Elsewhere, Lincoln's search for Sara has dire repercussions.
episodes.title: Orientación

episodes.synopsis: Michael tries to secure the safety of fellow prisoner James Whistler, who holds the key to Michael's freedom. Meanwhile, Lincoln investigates Sofia.
episodes.title: Fire / Water

episodes.synopsis: Michael hits a series of dead ends but learns more about Whistler, who tells Michael the truth. Meanwhile, Lincoln tries to rescue Sara and LJ.
episodes.title: Call Waiting

episodes.synopsis: As Mahone begins to hallucinate and T-Bag climbs in the prison hierarchy, Michael sets an escape plan in motion.
episodes.title: Good Fences

episodes.synopsis: Michael attempts to execute a successful escape. Meanwhile, a new inmate arrives who may know something about Whistler's past.
episodes.title: Interference

episodes.synopsis: Whistler is accused of murder just before the escape. Later, Mahone is offered a better deal, and Lincoln and Sofia must drug the guard.
episodes.title: Photo Finish

episodes.synopsis: Shifting loyalties abound as Michael and Whistler are forced to fight to the death. Meanwhile, Lechero's power is compromised.
episodes.title: Vamonos

episodes.synopsis: Susan makes a last-ditch effort to get Whistler out of Sona immediately -- and the plan makes everyone else expendable.
episodes.title: Bang and Burn

episodes.synopsis: A new warden at Sona places Michael in solitary confinement but eventually offers him hope. Later, Mahone and T-Bag join the tunnel escape party.
episodes.title: Boxed In

episodes.synopsis: Michael, Mahone, Whistler and Lechero try to escape through the tunnel. Meanwhile, Sofia discovers a wallet hidden inside Whistler's bag.
episodes.title: Dirt Nap

episodes.synopsis: As Michael finalizes plans for the escape, his fellow plotters begin to turn on him. Meanwhile, Whistler ponders a betrayal when Sofia is threatened.
episodes.title: Under & Out

episodes.synopsis: Michael, Whistler and McGrady escape from Sona -- but not everything goes according to plan, and the exchange is compromised.
episodes.title: Hell or High Water

episodes.synopsis: As the third season draws to a close, LJ and Whistler are exchanged, but more surprises abound. Meanwhile, T-Bag's scheming finally pays off.
episodes.title: The Art of the Deal

episodes.synopsis: Michael receives unbelievable news when he seeks revenge for Sara's death. Meanwhile, T-Bag is deserted in Mexico during his flight to freedom.
episodes.title: Scylla

episodes.synopsis: The gang has to break into the well-guarded home of Company man Stuart Tuxhorn. Elsewhere, T-Bag must go to extremes to survive.
episodes.title: Breaking & Entering

episodes.synopsis: Michael and the team have one day to locate the next cardholder or they risk going back to prison. Meanwhile, Mahone seeks revenge on Wyatt.
episodes.title: Shut Down

episodes.synopsis: To get the next data card, Michael, Lincoln and Sucre must crash a police benefit. Meanwhile, T-Bag arouses suspicion on the first day at his new job.
episodes.title: Eagles & Angels

episodes.synopsis: The gang, with Don's help, must break into a safe at the Treasury Department to get the next Scylla card. Elsewhere, Gretchen manages to escape.
episodes.title: Safe & Sound

episodes.synopsis: Mahone is arrested, putting the whole gang at risk -- and Mahone squarely in Wyatt's sights. Meanwhile, T-Bag's charade is discovered.
episodes.title: Blow Out

episodes.synopsis: Lincoln, Sucre, Sara and Roland follow a Scylla cardholder to Las Vegas, where Roland has his device commandeered after he gets caught gambling.
episodes.title: Five the Hard Way

episodes.synopsis: A daring plan is hatched to get the final card from Pad Man, and an uneasy alliance is formed with Gretchen -- but there's a traitor among the ranks.
episodes.title: The Price

episodes.synopsis: The team needs to make their way through a 30,000-gallon water main to get to Scylla. Meanwhile, T-Bag fends off an investigation.
episodes.title: Greatness Achieved

episodes.synopsis: Michael collapses and must go to the hospital. Elsewhere, Sucre steps on a land mine, and Trishanne's surprising secret is uncovered.
episodes.title: The Legend

episodes.synopsis: The team carries out their plan to steal Scylla, accompanied by an ailing Michael. Meanwhile, Gretchen encounters a setback in getting the sixth card.
episodes.title: Quiet Riot

episodes.synopsis: Michael and the gang pull off the Scylla heist from deep within Company headquarters -- but a terrible surprise awaits them.
episodes.title: Selfless

episodes.synopsis: As the gang deals with Don's betrayal, Lincoln is captured. Meanwhile, Don forces Gretchen to help him by holding her daughter and sister hostage.
episodes.title: Deal or No Deal

episodes.synopsis: Don and Gretchen, Michael and The Company are all after Scylla. Elsewhere, T-Bag has to make a tough decision as he holds Gretchen's family hostage.
episodes.title: Just Business

episodes.synopsis: When Michael undergoes surgery, he has visions of Westmoreland. Meanwhile, Lincoln and Sucre try to retrieve Scylla before Don and Gretchen sell it.
episodes.title: Going Under

episodes.synopsis: Lincoln, Don, Gretchen and T-Bag go to Miami to retrieve Scylla. Elsewhere, Michael learns something shocking about his mother as he's held captive.
episodes.title: The Sunshine State

episodes.synopsis: The Company pits Lincoln, Mahone, T-Bag and Don against Michael and Sara in a race to retrieve Scylla -- and all roads lead to the brothers' mother.
episodes.title: The Mother Lode

episodes.synopsis: Michael and Lincoln square off over Scylla as Christina sets her plan in motion. Meanwhile, T-Bag causes a scene at the Indian embassy.
episodes.title: Versus

episodes.synopsis: Michael has an uneasy reunion with Christina, who drops a bombshell regarding Lincoln. Elsewhere, Lincoln races to stop Christina's deadly plan.
episodes.title: S.O.B.

episodes.synopsis: Pandemonium erupts at the Panda Bay Hotel after an assassination at the global energy conference.
episodes.title: Cowboys & Indians

episodes.synopsis: As familiar faces return to help Michael in his quest to bring down The Company, Lincoln makes a discovery about his relationship to Michael.
episodes.title: Rate of Exchange

episodes.synopsis: After the general catches the brothers and raises the stakes by abducting more of their relatives, Michael escapes with Scylla.
episodes.title: Killing Your Number

episodes.synopsis: Michael orchestrates his final prison break to free the vulnerable Sara.
episodes.title: The Old Ball and Chain / Free
